summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Alley in Block 106 A. A. Denny's Broadway Add. beh. 8th & 9th Avenues from Union Street to University Street in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 21814, creating Local Improvement District No. 2193 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
